creator: StoneX Group Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Stay on top of the markets with the StoneX One trading app. Monitor the markets, adjust your positions, trade options, ETFs and mutual funds. Get real-time streaming data and breaking market news at a glance; place orders, add or withdraw funds – all from the StoneX mobile trading platform. Trade like a pro from anywhere with StoneX.

StoneX One: Built for the way you trade. Powered by StoneX – a Fortune 500 Financial Services company serving more than 370,000 active retail accounts worldwide.

QUICKLY OPEN AND FUND YOUR ACCOUNT
- Start trading stocks in minutes
- No account fees for active StoneX One accounts, No minimum deposit
- $0 Commissions

RESEARCH POTENTIAL TRADES, CREATE WATCHLISTS, AND SET YOUR STRATEGY
- $0 Real-Time Market Data for stocks, ETFs, and stock options
- See breaking news and trade the market from your mobile device
- Analyze financial statements and put/call ratios

REAL TIME, CUSTOMIZABLE PORTFOLIO-LEVEL DASHBOARD
- Monitor your trading performance in one view
- Evaluate your portfolio strategy and adjust with the market
- Track your investments using summary visualizations and advanced charting tools

BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, and ADVANCED CHARTS
- Configure charts and screens to match your preferences and experience level
- Choose from over 90 different indicators to match your strategy
- Compare stocks in a single chart

KEEP YOUR EAR TO THE MARKET 24/7
- Listen to earnings calls and access StoneX Market Intelligence reports directly from the StoneX One app
- Trade directly from the App Position Screen
- See insider rosters, monitor stock splits, and discover which mutual funds are trading stocks you’re interested in

CUSTOM ALERTS AND PRICE TRIGGERS
- Set custom alerts to keep up with price action
- Set Entry and Exit triggers so you never miss a trade

FIND TRADE HISTORY, TAX, AND FINANCIAL DOCUMENTS IN ONE PLACE
- Link to your financial institutions to the app
- See projected income from dividends
- Search and download Trade Confirmations, Deposits and Withdrawals

RESPONSIVE SUPPORT TEAM
- Live customer support available during U.S. trading hours
- Monday - Friday 8am to 6pm Eastern

Accounts opened through StoneX One are currently available to U.S. persons only. Nothing on this site is an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy securities, futures, options, products, or services in any jurisdiction where doing so would be contrary to local law or regulation.

All investments involve risk, including loss of principal. Past performance of any security, future, option, or strategy is no guarantee of future success. Consider your personal financial situation, including your risk tolerance, before investing. View the StoneX One fee schedule at stonexone.com/pricing.

Securities products and services are offered through SA Stone Wealth Management Inc. (SASWM), a registered broker-dealer and member FINRA/SIPC. View our Customer Relationship Summary at stonexone.com/crs. StoneX One accounts opened through SASWM are introduced to and custodied at StoneX Financial Inc. (SFI), and all customer orders will be transmitted to SFI for execution, clearance and settlement.

SFI is a member of FINRA/NFA/SIPC and registered with the MSRB. SFI is registered with both the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as a Broker-Dealer and with the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) as a Futures Commission Merchant and Commodity Trading Advisor. Exchange based futures and options products and services are offered solely through the FCM division of SFI, a member of NFA and registered with the CFTC as a Futures Commission Merchant and Commodity Trading Advisor.

Links:
https://www.finra.org/#/
https://www.sipc.org/
https://www.msrb.org/

Stay on top of the markets with the StoneX One trading app. Monitor the markets, adjust your positions, trade options, ETFs and mutual funds. Get real-time streaming data and breaking market news at a glance; place orders, add or withdraw funds – all from the StoneX mobile trading platform. Trade like a pro from anywhere with StoneX.

StoneX One: Built for the way you trade. Powered by StoneX – a Fortune 500 Financial Services company serving more than 370,000 active retail accounts worldwide.

QUICKLY OPEN AND FUND YOUR ACCOUNT
- Start trading stocks in minutes
- No account fees for active StoneX One accounts, No minimum deposit
- $0 Commissions

RESEARCH POTENTIAL TRADES, CREATE WATCHLISTS, AND SET YOUR STRATEGY
- $0 Real-Time Market Data for stocks, ETFs, and stock options
- See breaking news and trade the market from your mobile device
- Analyze financial statements and put/call ratios

REAL TIME, CUSTOMIZABLE PORTFOLIO-LEVEL DASHBOARD
- Monitor your trading performance in one view
- Evaluate your portfolio strategy and adjust with the market
- Track your investments using summary visualizations and advanced charting tools

BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, and ADVANCED CHARTS
- Configure charts and screens to match your preferences and experience level
- Choose from over 90 different indicators to match your strategy
- Compare stocks in a single chart

KEEP YOUR EAR TO THE MARKET 24/7
- Listen to earnings calls and access StoneX Market Intelligence reports directly from the StoneX One app
- Trade directly from the App Position Screen
- See insider rosters, monitor stock splits, and discover which mutual funds are trading stocks you’re interested in

CUSTOM ALERTS AND PRICE TRIGGERS
- Set custom alerts to keep up with price action
- Set Entry and Exit triggers so you never miss a trade

FIND TRADE HISTORY, TAX, AND FINANCIAL DOCUMENTS IN ONE PLACE
- Link to your financial institutions to the app
- See projected income from dividends
- Search and download Trade Confirmations, Deposits and Withdrawals

RESPONSIVE SUPPORT TEAM
- Live customer support available during U.S. trading hours
- Monday - Friday 8am to 6pm Eastern

Accounts opened through StoneX One are currently available to U.S. persons only. Nothing on this site is an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy securities, futures, options, products, or services in any jurisdiction where doing so would be contrary to local law or regulation.

All investments involve risk, including loss of principal. Past performance of any security, future, option, or strategy is no guarantee of future success. Consider your personal financial situation, including your risk tolerance, before investing. View the StoneX One fee schedule at stonexone.com/pricing.

Securities products and services are offered through SA Stone Wealth Management Inc. (SASWM), a registered broker-dealer and member FINRA/SIPC. View our Customer Relationship Summary at stonexone.com/crs. StoneX One accounts opened through SASWM are introduced to and custodied at StoneX Financial Inc. (SFI), and all customer orders will be transmitted to SFI for execution, clearance and settlement.

SFI is a member of FINRA/NFA/SIPC and registered with the MSRB. SFI is registered with both the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as a Broker-Dealer and with the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) as a Futures Commission Merchant and Commodity Trading Advisor. Exchange based futures and options products and services are offered solely through the FCM division of SFI, a member of NFA and registered with the CFTC as a Futures Commission Merchant and Commodity Trading Advisor.

Links:
https://www.finra.org/#/
https://www.sipc.org/
https://www.msrb.org/

SASWM and SFI are wholly-owned subsidiaries of StoneX Group Inc. (NASDAQ: SNEX). StoneX One is StoneX Group Inc.’s proprietary trading platform through which investors and traders can open securities and/or futures accounts. Not all products are available.
descriptionShort: Trade the market, manage your portfolio, build your next great stock strategy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Exciting New Features in the latest release:
Advanced Options Trading (Multi-leg options trading)
· Two Trades in One
· Multi-leg options involve executing several options positions simultaneously
· Roll out existing covered and long positions in one trade ticket
· Create Spreads and straddles
Cryptocurrency is now LIVE
· Ability for Users to View Quotes, Stats, and News for Bitcoin and Ethereum
· Add BTC and ETH to their watchlist
